title: "Why AI Is Next Flashpoint in US-China Tech Rivalry"
excerpt: "The technological rivalry between the US and China is heating up, and nowhere more fiercely than in artificial intelligence. That’s hardly a surprise given its potential to boost both nations’ productivity and competitiveness and to tip the geopolitical and military balance."
